page.title: 18RELIGION.
page.content: The main religion in{Great Britain}is {Christianity,}although there is a large{Muslim}community.{14%}of {Blackburn's}population are Muslim.A large number of these live in the {Audley}area.Due to this fact,we decided to interview one of Blackburn's Muslims.{Abdus Wadeewala is the son of an{Imman.}The two main celebrations in Islam are the two {"Eids".}The first takes place about June and celebrates the end of {"Ramadan",}a time of fasting.The second Eid takes place about September and remembers the sacrifice of Abraham's son,but these{dates vary each year.The focal point of any Muslim community is the{Mosque.}Apart from going there to pray{5}times a day it is also used as a gathering place, and as a place where the children can {learn}about{Islam.
